Application_Code.title: Application_Code
Application_Code.description: Format: 5 digit number, found on the Application record Application_Code__c field This is the unique identifier of the Application record

Candidate.title: Candidate
Candidate.description: This is the Candidate__c record and the Candidate specific questions' answers from the user should be populated on the record

CandidateSpecificQuestions.title: CandidateSpecificQuestions
CandidateSpecificQuestions.description:
These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Candidate Specific Questions field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically and the answers should be populated on the Candidate__c record on the following fields: 
The Career Goals to be populated on the Career Goals field
Cost to Company on the Cost to Company field
Cost To Company Breakdown on the Cost To Company Breakdown field
Reason for leaving current role on the Reason for leaving current role field

Email.title: Email
Email.description: Format: Email This is the Email Address the Candidate typed when they started their chat. This is the unique identifier if the Candidate record

QuestionsAndAnswers.title: QuestionsAndAnswers
QuestionsAndAnswers.description:
*QuestionsAndAnswersInstructions
These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Questions to ask field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically Number the Question, and bullet the answers
